title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows Trailer Reaction - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.15.24
description:
The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 

Tim, Blessing, Greg and Barrett react to the new Assassin’s Creed Shadows trailer, The Division Heartland has been canceled, and we got our first look at The Last of Us season 2.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:47 - Housekeeping
 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
      - GAMESCAST is an interview with Ninja Theory’s studio-head about Hellblade.
      - STREAM is Mike and Greg jumping back into Starfield.
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
      - You can get today’s Gregway
      - This Friday at 1pm, join us for the end of Nick's Epic Pokémon Nuzlocke. It’s the exciting conclusion of the saga that Kris Anka called: "Very annoying and anxiety inducing".
                 -  The Roper Report   -
00:04:37 - Assassin’s Creed Shadows Trailer Reaction
00:30:11 - Ubisoft Cancels The Division Heartland
00:39:06 - We’ve got our first look at Last of Us Season 2
00:42:04 - ‘Mortal Kombat 2’ Lands an October 2025 Release Date
00:43:46 - Yosuke Saito working on new project with Yoko Taro and Keiichi Okabe
00:47:13 - Wee News!
00:51:38 - You‘re Wrong
